text: Map of Wales with the Vale of Glamorgan highlighted This is a list of public art in the Vale of Glamorgan. The Vale of Glamorgan is a county borough in south-east Wales. It is the southernmost unitary authority in Wales and is bordered by Bridgend, Cardiff, and Rhondda Cynon Taf. This list applies only to works of public art on permanent display in an outdoor public space and does not, for example, include artworks in museums. ==Barry== ==Cowbridge== ==Dinas Powys== ==Llangan== ==Llantwit Major== ==Penarth== ==Porthkerry== ==St Athan== ==Wenvoe== ==References== Vale of Glamorgan Category:Vale of Glamorgan
title: List of public art in the Vale of Glamorgan
